# Quantas medidas podemos obter?

.lc-30[
```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
fla <- image_import("figs/flax.jpg")
res <-
  analyze_objects(fla,
                  reference = TRUE,
                  reference_area = 20,
                  efourier = TRUE,
                  haralick = TRUE,
                  ab_angles = TRUE,
                  marker = "id")
```

]

.rc-70[
```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
fla <- image_import("figs/flax.jpg")
res <-
  analyze_objects(fla,
                  reference = TRUE,
                  reference_area = 20,
                  efourier = TRUE,
                  haralick = TRUE,
                  ab_angles = TRUE,
                  plot = FALSE)
medidas <- get_measures(res)
apply(medidas, 2, round, digits = 2) |> print_table()
```

]
